price: Apakah kamu tiada melihat bahwasanya Allah menurunkan air dari langit, lalu jadilah bumi itu hijau? Sesungguhnya Allah Maha Halus lagi Maha Mengetahui.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَتُصۡبِحُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُخۡضَرَّةًۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina al-samāi māan fatuṣ'biḥu al-arḍu mukh'ḍarratan inna al-laha laṭīfun khabīrun
